byline.original: By MICHAEL CIEPLY and BROOKS BARNES

abstract: Facing fierce resistance from theater owners, the studio has tabled a plan to make its forthcoming film "Tower Heist'' available on video-on-demand in two test markets just three weeks after its theatrical release.
snippet: Facing fierce resistance from theater owners, the studio has tabled a plan to make its forthcoming film "Tower Heist'' available on video-on-demand in two test markets just three weeks after its theatrical release.
